item.description: For our August meeting, we'll gather on the deck and in the pool at Gloria's house for a nice summer barbecue and then hold our monthly meeting. Please plan to bring food to share and ideas for the fall calendar of events. Alternate plans in the event of a poor weather forecast will be announced a few days before, if needed. Because this is at a private home, you must RSVP to get directions.
item.how_to_find_us: Come around back to the deck!
item.name: Party on the pool deck (and a meeting)
